# puny-coder

> Punycode converter for representation of Unicode with the limited ASCII character subset.

Lightweight and efficient utility to transcode between Unicode and ASCII using the Punycode algorithm (RFC 3492). Ideal for IDN (Internationalized Domain Names) handling and URL encoding/decoding where Unicode characters are not natively supported.

## Docs

- [README](https://github.com/r37r0m0d3l/punycoder#readme): Full usage guide, features, and detailed parameter descriptions.
- [NPM Package](https://www.npmjs.com/package/puny-coder): Latest version and distribution details.
- [Repository](https://github.com/r37r0m0d3l/punycoder): Source code, issues, and development status.

## API

- `asciiToUnicode(text: string, onError?: string, urlDecode?: boolean): string`: Converts a Punycode ASCII string back to its Unicode representation.
- `unicodeToAscii(text: string, onError?: string, urlEncode?: boolean, skipOnValid?: boolean): string`: Converts a Unicode string to its Punycode ASCII representation.

## Examples

- [Usage Examples](https://github.com/r37r0m0d3l/punycoder/blob/main/test/index.test.js):

  Unicode to ASCII.

  ```ts
  import { unicodeToAscii } from 'puny-coder';
 
  unicodeToAscii("Здравей, свят!"); // "xn--%2C%20!-5cdkcjkOy7esao5p"
  unicodeToAscii("Ahoj, světe!"); // "xn--Ahoj%2C%20svte!-nsb"
  unicodeToAscii("αβγ"); // "xn--mxacd"
  unicodeToAscii("ยจฆฟคฏข"); // "xn--22cdfh1b8fsa"
  unicodeToAscii("도메인"); // "xn--hq1bm8jm9l"
  unicodeToAscii("ドメイン名例"); // "xn--eckwd4c7cu47r2wf"
  ```

  ASCII to Unicode.
  ```ts
  import { asciiToUnicode } from 'puny-coder';
 
  asciiToUnicode("xn--%2C%20!-5cdkcjkOy7esao5p"); // "Здравей, свят!"
  asciiToUnicode("xn--Ahoj%2C%20svte!-nsb"); // "Ahoj, světe!"
  asciiToUnicode("xn--mxacd"); // "αβγ"
  asciiToUnicode("xn--22cdfh1b8fsa"); // "ยจฆฟคฏข"
  asciiToUnicode("xn--hq1bm8jm9l"); // "도메인"
  asciiToUnicode("xn--eckwd4c7cu47r2wf"); // "ドメイン名例"
  ```
